input: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander has made 860 total field goals, 163 three-point field goals, and has attempted 1656 field goals. What is his effective field goal percentage (eFG%) as a decimal? Round to the nearest 3 decimal places.

Anthony Edwards has scored 2177 total points, attempted 1612 field goals, and attempted 496 free throws. What is his true shooting percentage (TS%) as a decimal? Round to the nearest 3 decimal places.
Nikola Jokić has attempted 331 three-point field goals and 1364 total field goals. What is his 3-point attempt rate (3PAr) as a decimal? Round to the nearest 3 decimal places.
Giannis Antetokounmpo has attempted 707 free throws and 1319 field goals. What is his free throw rate (FTr) as a decimal? Round to the nearest 3 decimal places.
